title: Perform Blind Receiving
description: To ensure accuracy, a warehouse is configured for 'blind receiving', where operators don't see the expected PO quantity and must count from scratch.

tasks.description: Scan the BOL, and the system retrieves the PO but hides the expected quantities from the operator.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator sees the items to be received but no quantities.

tasks.description: The operator counts and enters the physical quantity for each item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator enters their counted quantities.

tasks.description: After submission, the system compares the counted quantity to the PO quantity and flags any discrepancies for a manager to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system reveals a discrepancy on one item and creates a supervisory review task.
